transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Ha sir Amrit baat kar raha hu namaste kaise ho?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Are Amrit bhai kya hai yaar kya laga rakha hai?

Customer: Ye dabbe wabbe band kar do kya kya kar rahe ho yaar.

Customer: Teen din se char din se aapka issue solve nahi ho raha hai bhai.

Executive: Ye Saturday Sunday to sir maine check karwaya tha to uske baad unki bhi response nahi aayi thi. Abhi aaj subah dekha ki aapne call kara hua tha.

Executive: To abhi tak theek nahi hua dusre phone mein bhi.

Customer: Aapne kabhi aapne kabhi dekha hai ye hospital band hota hai Sunday Sunday.

Executive: Nahi wo to band nahi hota na uske liye to maine bola ki.

Customer: Wo wo essential service hai na isliye ye bhi dekho agar aap aap logo ne ispe bhi chutti hoti rakhi hoti hai na wo paise aap kat dete theek hai. To uske uske hisab se hum bhi bolte ki nahi aapka Saturday Sunday hai chod do isko.

Customer: Lekin uske bhi aap paise lete ho na.

Executive: Uske liye nahi bol raha hu main main ye bol raha tha ki Saturday Sunday main office nahi aaya tha wo bol raha tha main. Main ye thodi bol raha tha ki aapka kaam nahi hua ye uske to mail dal rakha hai. Main ye puch raha tha ki wapas.

Customer: Sir ye ye service ki baat hoti hai isme Saturday Sunday koi nahi dekhta hai.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul.

Customer: Service de do service de do aapko kaun bolega fir aapko call bhi nahi aate na meri kabhi. Saturday ye service dene ki wajah se.

Executive: Sir uske liye main mana nahi kar raha hu main uske liye maine bola hi nahi main ye bol raha hu ki sir aapne dusre phone mein login karke ek baar check karai in do do dino mein.

Customer: Are bahut sare phoneo mein kisi mein bhi.

Executive: Nahi ho pa raha hai.

Customer: Kisi mein nahi hua. Na na.

Executive: App bhi uninstall do uninstall do bar kiya uninstall kiya to fir bhi nahi chal raha hai koi bhi nahi chal raha.

Executive: Ek bar ek bar aaj main finally iska karwa deta hu main ek bar abhi bahar ja kar baat hi kar leta hu sir iske bare mein. Ab wo 100% confirm karke main batata hu aaj. Aaj ho jayega sir solution.

Executive: Confirm kar leta hu main theek hai.

Customer: Ha theek hai dekhte hai. Ok ok dekhte hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's issue has not been resolved.

- Issue persists across multiple devices.



Resolution:

- Executive will confirm and provide an update today.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back today.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- service, issue, resolution, login
